snippet.title: The Making of 'Legend Demake' | Tomb Raider Level Editor
snippet.description:
The making of TOMB RAIDER: LEGEND DEMAKE, a re-imagined Legend experience in the classic TR engine! 

The first chapter is out, it includes 4 levels!
➡️ Download link: https://trcustoms.org/levels/3553

Legend Demake is a fan game/remake of Tomb Raider: Legend. It is developed by Delca using an enhanced version of the TR4 engine (called TRNG). Gameplay and environments are reimagined how they would be like if they were made by Core Design in the late 90's/early 2000's.
Tomb Raider: Legend originally came out in 2006 and was developed by Crystal Dynamics.


Support my work ❤️
➡️ https://www.paypal.com/paypalme/DelcaTRLE

I'm on Twitter!
➡️ https://twitter.com/DelcaTRLE

Keep up with all Legend Demake updates on the forums:
➡️ https://www.tombraiderforums.com/showthread.php?t=227891

00:00:00 Introduction
00:00:39 Making-of 

Credit: @hashta_vp for the 2 screenshots used in the thumbnail

#TombRaider #TombRaiderLevelEditor #TRLE #TombRaiderLegend
